1. Last update for Dr Adam
- We will propose research study proposal to Dr Voon oncologist and Dr Adam. On lung cancer panel. Pending research proposal fro m Thermo. Medica Elaine has concerns that Dr Adam prefers Illumina's open system. Saying that they can't run additional tests and tied to Thermo. To address concerns by conducting talk or discussion to deal with customer objections. Also suggest that we involve more people rather than just Dr Adam himself in this project.

So instead focus Prof Dayang and Prof Voon, will focus Hospital SO and mlt instead. Requested for installation base and conduct customer site visit at PIL.
